record.title: ORDER OF PROCEDURE

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, my understanding was that if possible--I made some calls earlier today that that may be waived and that I go up to 25 minutes.

Mr. President, reserving the right to object, I ask unanimous consent that the Senator from Tennessee be given the amount of time he wants, and immediately following that, that I would be recognized for such time as I shall consume.

record.chair: Does the Senator from Oklahoma have a sense for how much time that will be?
Without objection, it is so ordered.
The Senator from Tennessee is recognized.
